features: WHAT YOU'LL GET: Six 16-ounce bottles of Tom's of Maine Wicked Fresh Natural Mouthwash in Cool Mountain Mint Flavor
NOW, THAT'S FRESH: This natural mouth rinse is clinically proven to provide long-lasting fresh breath
GOODBYE BAD BREATH: Uses zinc to neutralize odor caused by bad breath germs and leaves a cool, minty finish
BOOST CONFIDENCE: Swish this alcohol-free mouthwash for lasting freshness
TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF NATURALLY: Contains no artificial dyes or sweeteners and is not tested on animals
body.description: Long-lasting fresh breath? Yes, please! Painful burning sensation? No thanks! Tom's of Maine Wicked Fresh! Natural Mouthwash brings out your best breath without the burn. This fluoride-free, alcohol-free* mouthwash uses zinc to neutralize the odor caused by bad breath germs. Plus, it contains no artificial flavors, colors or preservatives and is not tested on animals. Swish the Cool Mountain Mint flavor before your next presentation or hot date for a little boost of confidence. To use, vigorously swish between your teeth for one minute, then spit out. At Tom's of Maine, we want to empower families to live more naturally. With more than 50 years experience combining scientific know-how, naturally derived ingredients and a bit of ingenuity, we make products that are good for you and the planet. As a Certified B Corp, we hold ourselves to the highest social and environmental standards. Plus, we're committed to supporting local communities for meaningful change, donating 10% of our profits to charities supporting health, education and the environment. We call this "doing good, for real," and it impacts everything we do. *Product does not contain ethyl alcohol.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oral Care Whether you’re looking for a natural sensitive toothpaste or a fluoride-free kids toothpaste, Tom’s of Maine has a number of safe, effective ways to keep your teeth and mouth clean without artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. Deodorant & Antiperspirant Tom’s of Maine products give your underarms the attention they deserve. We combine the naturally sourced and naturally derived ingredients to help keep you feeling fresh for up to 24 hours. Bath & Body Our natural cleansing line features organic botanicals like virgin coconut oil, raw shea butter, and other ingredients sourced and derived from nature. Every personal care product is free of artificial flavors, fragrances, colors, sweeteners and preservatives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toms natural mouthwash is a keeper!
reviews.reviewText: This is a terrific mouthwash, honestly. I have teeth implants & foods get stuck under the plates as my implants have 3 teeth on 2 implants. Because of this I must use a water pic & there’s always a poor taste in my mouth hours after eating. This mouthwash is all natural & by swishing it in my mouth for 30 seconds it keeps my mouth fresh all day literally so, & no poor taste from my implants any longer! No alcohol, nor harmful chemicals that other mouthwashes certainly have. The skin is the largest organ in the body, & the mouth is even more sensitive,(this is why many medications people take are dissolved under the tongue because it enters the bloodstream immediately). So, when you use regular mouthwashes those harmful chemicals included within them go directly into your body’s bloodstream. Toms natural mouthwash has no alcohol & no harmful chemicals, so I feel safe using it, it keeps my mouth & breath fresh all day, & it’s cost effective to purchase a case of them from Amazon,(saving me gas, wear/tear on my vehicle because I don’t have to drive to the store to purchase it, I don’t have to go to a crowded store with Covid & Monkey Pox prevalent now, & can have it delivered to my home, saving me even more with free shipping and handling, because I purchase Prime with Amazon & S/H essentially pays for itself with in one month for our household). A win-win purchase all around for my Family & Myself! Thank you Amazon.
